## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0c1a0ed2d0fd6cab78604fbbbc988dcc649199fe0062a5ddff4a79dc1a8d9ef6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@ms-atlas/datastudio' @ 0.1.21 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
